::DrillBit::

DrillBit was surprized to see KitKat raise her voice. She hadn't done
that since he arrived. He was woundering if they were going to be
attacked, or if Rowdy just wanted to play music.(He is playing his fluit
right?) He also had other things on his mind, he thought, looking at
KitKat. Things like what they were going to do there next "no trouble"
night.
